alert.note: Alert for Cass; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Richland; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 11:59AM CST until February 10 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...A period of snow is expected. Strong southerly winds combined with the falling snow will lead to an hour or two of near blizzard conditions. There is a chance of freezing rain as the snow ends. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Minnesota and northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 4 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong cold front will move through the region tonight into Friday morning, leading to additional winter impacts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Richland; Steele; Traill
